Columbia has made available for return 100 percent of the remains of 14 Native American individuals taken from two counties in North Dakota. They are available for return to 13 tribes.

Ransom County: Columbia reported the remains of four individuals from within Ransom County.

North Dakota

Morton County: Columbia reported the remains of 10 individuals from within Morton County.
